cov_total.Description: Custom questionnaire measuring how participants were affected by the covid pandemic

DASS_dep.LongName: Depression Anxiety Stress Scale, Depression Score
DASS_dep.Description: The Depression Anxiety Stress Scales (DASS; (Lovibond and Lovibond, 1995) ) assesses affective state over the previous seven days.

DASS_anx.LongName: Depression Anxiety Stress Scale, Anxiety Score
DASS_anx.Description: The Depression Anxiety Stress Scales (DASS; (Lovibond and Lovibond, 1995) ) assesses affective state over the previous seven days.

DASS_str.LongName: Depression Anxiety Stress Scale, Stress Score
DASS_str.Description: The Depression Anxiety Stress Scales (DASS; (Lovibond and Lovibond, 1995) ) assesses affective state over the previous seven days.

bas_d.Description: The BIS/BAS Scale measures the behavioural approach system on the subscales drive,  fun seeking and reward responsiveness and the behavioural inhibition system (Carver and White, 1994).

bas_f.Description: The BIS/BAS Scale measures the behavioural approach system on the subscales drive,  fun seeking and reward responsiveness and the behavioural inhibition system (Carver and White, 1994).

bas_r.Description: The BIS/BAS Scale measures the behavioural approach system on the subscales drive,  fun seeking and reward responsiveness and the behavioural inhibition system (Carver and White, 1994).

bis.Description: The BIS/BAS Scale measures the behavioural approach system on the subscales drive,  fun seeking and reward responsiveness and the behavioural inhibition system (Carver and White, 1994).

BIG5_ext.Description: Big Five Inventory (BFI, Goldberg, 1993) measures Extraversion, Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Openness and Neuroticism.

BIG5_agr.Description: Big Five Inventory (BFI, Goldberg, 1993) measures Extraversion, Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Openness and Neuroticism.

BIG5_con.Description: Big Five Inventory (BFI, Goldberg, 1993) measures Extraversion, Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Openness and Neuroticism.

BIG5_neu.Description: Big Five Inventory (BFI, Goldberg, 1993) measures Extraversion, Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Openness and Neuroticism.

BIG5_ope.Description: Big Five Inventory (BFI, Goldberg, 1993) measures Extraversion, Agreeableness, Conscientiousness, Openness and Neuroticism.

erq_cr.Description: The Emotion Regulation Questionnaire (ERQ) is a short tool measuring two facets of emotion regulation: Cognitive Reappraisal and Expressive Suppression. Gross, J.J., & John, O.P. (2003).

erq_es.Description: The Emotion Regulation Questionnaire (ERQ) is a short tool measuring two facets of emotion regulation: Cognitive Reappraisal and Expressive Suppression. Gross, J.J., & John, O.P. (2003).
